answers.answer: Hello,A clinical evaluation is essential for correct diagnosis. Ball of foot pain is often caused by forces or stresses acting around the area of the metatarsal bones. These forces and stresses can have lots of causes like wearing high heels, sports or activities that increase the pressure in the ball of foot.Injuries such as stress fractures in the metatarsals can also cause ball of foot pain. Other causes of pain and needle lie sensations could be due to diabetes mellitus, peripheral neuropathy etc.Seeking medical help will definitely help. Do keep us posted.Best of luck and kind regards!
